verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: did] [ARG1: a 40-day yoga and meditation challenge] [ARGM-TMP: just over a month ago] i felt like i was in sort of a workout rut walking out of a hot yoga class one night i was stopped by a friend who asked me if i had heard about the 40 days program as in yoga guru baron baptiste 40 days to personal revolution andy puddicombe lyon den yoga yoga 40-day us baron baptiste meditation
